title: Projects
intro: Discover my projects that showcase my Python development skills, as well as my passion for creating useful and engaging applications. Whether it's interactive games or Telegram bots, each project was designed to offer a pleasant user experience while addressing specific needs.

projects.title: TikTok Complaint Classification Model
projects.description: To develop a predictive model for TikTok, this project aims to determine whether a video contains a statement or expresses an opinion. The primary goal of the project is to reduce the number of user reports that require manual moderation and improve processing efficiency.

projects.title: Cyclistic Case Study
projects.description: This project analyzes the use of Cyclistic bikes by annual members and casual users. The goal is to provide marketing recommendations to convert casual users into annual members and improve user satisfaction.

projects.title: Spam Detection with NLTK
projects.description: To create an effective spam detector for messages, this project uses natural language processing (NLP) techniques with the NLTK library. It includes data preprocessing, feature extraction, and training a Naïve Bayes model.

projects.title: Cats and Dogs Image Classification
projects.description: This project involves training a convolutional neural network (CNN) to classify images of cats and dogs. The model is able to recognize image features to predict whether the image represents a cat or a dog.

projects.title: Weather Telegram Bot
projects.description: Telegram bot that allows users to get real-time weather information for any city. After selecting a city, the user receives details about the current weather, including temperature, feels-like temperature, and the minimum and maximum temperatures for the day.

projects.title: MultiTool Telegram Bot
projects.description: A Telegram bot designed to simplify users' lives. With this bot, users can generate complex passwords of any length, shorten links to various resources, and roll dice.

projects.title: Clicker Game
projects.description: A clicker game where the goal is to score as many points as possible. Players can use accumulated points to buy multipliers, significantly boosting their score.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: Snake game where the goal is to score as many points as possible. Players have a large maneuvering area, making the game dynamic and engaging.
